Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CliUpdateHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CliUpdateHandler
public class CliUpdateHandler
extends UpdateHandler
This class handles all the updates from server to different clients. Every possible updates go to this class before it's viewable from users (in the CLI). BoardUpdate, DisconnectedPlayerUpdate, ErrorUpdate, GamePhaseUpdate, GodsUpdate, InitialInfoUpdate, LoseUpdate, MatchStartedUpdate, ServerUnreachableUpdate, TurnUpdate, WinUpdate are all managed in this class.

This class represent the Visitor in the Visitor Pattern, it implements UpdateHandler to have all the necessary methods to handle all possible updates.

See Also:
UpdateHandler

  • Field Details

    • cliInstance

      private final Cli cliInstance
      Instance of the Cli which this handler has to update

  • Constructor Details

    • CliUpdateHandler

      CliUpdateHandler​(Cli cliInstance, Controller controller)
      This is the creator of the class. At the moment of the instance creation an instance of Cli and Controller, to which the class refers, are set.
      Parameters:
      cliInstance - is the instance of Cli associated to the CliUpdateHandler for updates.
      controller - is the instance of the controller that is observed by the Cli.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle​(MatchStartedUpdate update)
      This method handles MatchStartedUpdate arrived from the Cli. It prints several lines in console, to let players know that match has started.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of MatchStartedUpdate from Cli.

    • handle

      public void handle​(GodsUpdate update)
      This method handles GodsUpdate arrived from the Cli. In this method there is a distinction between GodChooser and other players. If the player in Cli associated is GodChooser than some lines explains him what to do, In non-GodChooser case players are invited to select their Gods.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of GodsUpdate from Cli.

    • handle

      public void handle​(InitialInfoUpdate update)
      This method handles InitialInfoUpdate arrived from the Cli. Once players choose how many players are involved in their match, they have to choose a nickname and a color to play. This class notifies them about that, inviting them to choose a nickname and a color, not already chosen from other players.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of InitialInfoUpdate from Cli.

    • handle

      public void handle​(BoardUpdate update)
      This method handles BoardUpdate arrived from the Cli. This method manages commands during REAL_GAME phase. In cases in which players move or build in a specific cell, to let all players clearly know about that, it is printed that player has [moved/built] with a worker in a cell.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - is the instance of BoardUpdate from Cli.

    • handle

      public void handle​(ErrorUpdate update)
      This method handles ErrorUpdate arrived from the Cli. This method manages all the wrong command generated. Once the command is parsed for the correct-format it is notified to the Controller, after some checks server-side if an ErrorUpdate is notified it means that the command was correct in syntax but an impossible action was requested.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - the instance of ErrorUpdate given from Cli.

    • commonErrorHandling

      private void commonErrorHandling​(ErrorUpdate update)
      This private method was extracted from error handling procedure, to avoid duplicates for errors handled the same way for different CommandType. Specifically, this handles ErrorType.WRONG_GAME_PHASE, ErrorType.INVALID_CELL and ErrorType.GENERIC_ERROR.
      Parameters:
      update - the error update which arrived from Cli.

    • handle

      public void handle​(GamePhaseUpdate update)
      This method handles GamePhaseUpdate arrived from the Cli. Every time the game phase changes, this method prints the name of the new current phase upper case font to all the players involved in the match.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains a reference to the new GamePhase.

    • handle

      public void handle​(TurnUpdate update)
      This method handles TurnUpdate arrived from the Cli. When a player ends is turn, new current turn pass to the next player in game.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains information about the new turn, it means that new current turn needs to be updated.

    • handle

      public void handle​(WinUpdate update)
      This method handles WinUpdate arrived from the Cli. When a player wins the match, all the players are notified, and they can decide to play another game or exit the game.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains information who won the match.

    • handle

      public void handle​(LoseUpdate update)
      This method handles LoseUpdate arrived from the Cli. When a player lose, the motivation of this lose is notified to all the players. In case two other players remains, player who lost is asked if he wants to continue watch the match in which he was involved. In case only one player remains, it automatically wins.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains information about the new turn, it means that new current turn needs to be updated.

    • handle

      public void handle​(ServerUnreachableUpdate update)
      This method handles ServerUnreachableUpdate arrived from the UpdateListener. This method informs players that something went wrong during connection to server phase, and quits the game.
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains the instance of the serverError given from client-side Controller.

    • handle

      public void handle​(DisconnectedPlayerUpdate update)
      This method handles DisconnectedPlayerUpdate arrived from the Cli. When a player logs out the match ends and all the players are informed about the end of the match due to "[playerDisconnectedNickname] disconnected!"
      Specified by:
      handle in class UpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      update - contains the information about which player logged out.

    • availableGods

      private java.lang.StringBuilder availableGods()
      This private method creates a StringBuilder containing all the names of all possible Gods available. It is used in CHOOSE_GODS game phase, it allows GodChooser to choose as many Gods as players involved in the match, having all the GodsName available in console.
      Returns:
      a String that is printed only for GodChooser during CHOOSE_GODS phase.
